website_summaries.verdict: As long as you don't need to change shooting modes on the go, the ContourRoam2 is a simple way to capture fine-quality POV videos in dry or wet conditions.
pros: A very simple POV action cam, the Contour ContourRoam2 produces nice video
is waterproof without requiring a housing
and has a threaded tripod mount for more mounting options
cons: All changes to settings -- including shooting modes -- are done with desktop software, and the ContourRoam2 can't record 1080p video at a 170-degree angle of view
The rechargeable battery can't be removed or replaced by a user

customer_reviews.title: this camera is great. i know everyone goes crazy over gopro
customer_reviews.text: this camera is great. i know everyone goes crazy over gopro, but this camera works fantastic. its my second one. i attach these to my motorcycle in multiple spots. video always comes out looking fantastic. i only record on 720 60frames per second. there are even higher quality settings. looks great everytime. highly recommend this camera for action video.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Good action camera
customer_reviews.text: I hate that this company has gone out of business. But if you can still find one of these cameras and want a good quality action video image, but one! I have four of these cameras (and yes I own GoPros also) and love the Contour. Biggest advantage is the shape and size and mounts (and VERY clear video image). I bought this one as a gift and they love it. I use the model with GPS in my car as a dashcam. They are getting harder to find since the company went out of business, but I think you will like these little cameras (they use mico SD cards).
customer_reviews.author: RayH

customer_reviews.title: better form and color
customer_reviews.text: I really prefer these over the go-pro, better form and color...again my opinion. I've done everything from mounting it on a go-kart to dropping it into a pond full of trout(in the waterproof case) while feeding them to see the action. Coupled with a 32GB card it will record quite a bit of footage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice action cam, especially under $150 when I purchased it. It has decent video and the mic is alright for an action cam. I've found that the Mic on the camera can become distorted very easily if it has been submerged in water or been dropped in sand or mud. Other than that it's really awesome that it can go under water, even if only a few feet, so you don't have to put a bulky case on it. You can purchase a case if you want to go deeper than about 3 feet though. The reason I bought this was to record Airsoft and Dirt Bike videos and it serves it's job decently.
customer_reviews.author: McKasy

customer_reviews.title: Very important for new customers!
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great, it's really great that you can use it in water up to 1 m without any special case. But there is a very important thing you should know. COUNTOUR Co. is bankruptcy. What does this mean? Well, first of all I don't know where we can claim for warranty. Second of all, any questions will be answered by... NO ONE. Third, if you want to download the Storyteller Software (to program the camera) you will have to search in the internet and find some kind forum user that shares this program to you. Other than that it works great and it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chys

customer_reviews.title: Great video quality.
customer_reviews.text: The last time I used this camera it was known as the VHoldR. I will tell you this company has made leaps, and bounds progress since their humble beginning. I still love their slim profile, and side attach mounts. It stays tucked, and out of the way yet captures all of the adventure. I can't wait to upgrade to the Contour3. Was well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Fields

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had any issues with this. It's typically ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any issues with this. It's typically mounted to my bicycle helmet and it records very well. I much prefer this style over the GoPro style. I also took it to the Bahamas and had the waterproof case and it performed amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: jerome santos

customer_reviews.title: Great cam for recreation use
customer_reviews.text: Great cam for recreation use. YES...It is Water Proof. We submerged it for 5 minutes or more and we continue to enjoy the benefits of this camera. Little heavy but durable. SPLASH
customer_reviews.author: Cycle Zombie

customer_reviews.title: Solid cam. Not a lot of bells and whistles ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid cam. Not a lot of bells and whistles, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Contour is a great product but the support for repairs is horrid.
customer_reviews.text: I had a kid crack the lens on my Contour Roam. I couldn't find repair parts so I purchased this. really wish Contour would get off their collective asses and get some repair parts into the system. then I'd have 2 good working cameras!
customer_reviews.author: T. Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Rugged action camera that provides stable shots in spite of rough use. Frequently used underwater without failure. Mindless operation with the push button record switch.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Null

customer_reviews.title: Pick this up just before they closed
customer_reviews.text: great cam, have an older version also which still works great might pickup another one of these if the price is right I mainly use them in elapsed time mode for stills during motorcycle rides But have also used them for snowboarding
customer_reviews.author: Eric Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Happy owner
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this camera, easy to use and after watching a video its easy to load on my computer. Only problem is poor night time videos or it would get 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot of action camera but this one is good in size and shape
customer_reviews.text: I seen a lot of action camera but this one is good in size and shape.
customer_reviews.author: G-Mo

customer_reviews.title: quality camera and simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice action camera. Love the one button on_off simplicity. great 1080 definition.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Simple operation, great video quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple operation, endless mounting options, and durability. Cons: You must attach to a PC to change aspect settings, and to charge the battery. There is a work around using preformatted SD cards, one for each setting. Also would be nice if a mobil app existed so this could be done on a phone or tablet. Heading to Burning Man soon, that will be the true test.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Evans

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Has survived riding in the rain, hot sun, drops from 5-10 ft, and keeps on going! Fantastic product. Just need to upgrade the memory and I'll be REALLY happy.
customer_reviews.author: EineBeBoP

customer_reviews.title: The Contour
customer_reviews.text: Recipient loves this camera, just wish there was some type of wrist handle, or strap
customer_reviews.author: BelStar

customer_reviews.title: I cycle every day, this is my proof of ...
customer_reviews.text: I cycle every day, this is my proof of who is at fault if I get hit by a car. God forbid it happening, but I will have it recorded.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Took it jet-skiing and it stood up well to some pretty tough salt-water whacks. Rinsed it off when done and good to go. Note: the "Storyteller" software that comes with it is VIEWING ONLY - can't edit at all. This isn't a problem if you use a third-party video editor, but don't expect decent software with the camera. The sliding lock on/off is great and easy to use. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Homme

customer_reviews.title: Great action Cam
customer_reviews.text: Great action Cam. Great price. Very easy to work with. Sturdy. Easy substitute for a go pro or sony action cam.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ruano

customer_reviews.title: FUN TOY
customer_reviews.text: This went on my sons motorcycle helmet. Before it went on, he played with it in the house. He is having a blast videoing things from his head!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene D. Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for my son and he thought it was pretty cool!
customer_reviews.author: Rockbrant

customer_reviews.title: Front element easily scratches, Mic is poor
customer_reviews.text: My title pretty much summarises my experience. I bought this for my wife as we were travelling to the Galapagos islands and she needed something to take with her on her dives. After the first dive, the mic stopped working and by the end of the trip, the front element was scratched despite the fact that the camera was used very sparingly. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sarma

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera! Came completely ready to use
customer_reviews.text: Fun camera! Came completely ready to use, I know own two contour camera and they are very easy to use. Highly recommend to anyone who enjoys filming.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great HD picture...
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my recent ski vacation. The videos turn out at great quality. Wish it had a way to show me what it's filming, hard to tell until you connect to the computer and download. Otherwise, very comfortable and easy to operate, even with your gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Feuerstein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little camera gets the job done and hasn't let ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little camera gets the job done and hasn't let me down once. really enjoy the laser for adjusting the lens
customer_reviews.author: EDGAR

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for Christmas. Great camera. Worth the money. Great quality. We purchased the bike mount to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: not as small as i thought but the video quality compensates everything, easy to use, and the battery never dies.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Francisco Duque

customer_reviews.title: Contour Roam2
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases i ever made to record my family's pool and water activitiesty!!!!!!!!!! Video quality is outstanding. so easy to use and download
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for the slopes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and the ski mounts for my brother for Christmas, immediately prior to a week-long ski trip. The video that resulted was nothing short of awesome. He reports that it was very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Gaige B. Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Camera died not come with instruction manual so you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera died not come with instruction manual so you have to figure out on your own how to operate it . I will be returning it !
customer_reviews.author: Ms. 66666

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I ever bought at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I ever bought at amazon. It came defective, and contour never responded my emals (support). Camera beeps constantly and cuts the videos after 10 seconds. Their website is a mess, I've tried to download Storyteller for my Mac a number of times and the site won't work. Try emailing their support department. This company is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Salas Reifschnedier

customer_reviews.title: Contour out of business :(
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked fine for 3 weeks, Than completely dead. Contour co. out of businesses, and no support. I loved the camera and purchased different mounts for it,too bad it stop working. Amazon refunded my money (Thank god I still had time).
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: discontinued product
customer_reviews.text: its ok. but its been discontinued. even if its cheaper theres no more support for this product. an ok product for back up but if it breaks then you've wasted your money. go for go pro 3
customer_reviews.author: xtreme

customer_reviews.title: no internet support
customer_reviews.text: The online support to use the camera properly is not user friendly. Apparently, the company has gone out of business. Out of the box, the camera needs updated, a manual is available only on line and to adjust the camera requires online functions. None of the above works. Best look else where for this type camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: This is completely useless to me. It came with NOT ONE WORD of instructions! Sorry, but I'm not a technical giant. I should have sent it back but kept playing around with it thinking I would figure. I gave it to my son, and he's not dumb, but he kept it for a couple weeks and decided it was useless too. Sorry, this one is a bummer! Perhaps if instructions had been included it would have been a completely different story.
customer_reviews.author: Gwenlyn Magee

product_meta.title: Contour ROAM2 Waterproof Video Camera (Red)
product_meta.description:
The ContourROAM2 brings brilliant updates to our most loved camera, while retaining the features that made it a best seller.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 



Live life in color. The ContourROAM2 brings brilliant updates to our most loved camera, while retaining the features that made it a best seller. Still the simplest camera to use on the market, the locking Instant On-Record switch makes it easy to get the perfect shot. While black is always in style, we've spiced it up by offering the ContourROAM2 in two additional colors: red and blue. We've also upped the frame rate to 60fps at 720p, and fine-tuned the picture giving the video quality incredible clarity.





CONTOURROAM2 PRODUCT FEATURES:

LOCKING INSTANT-ON RECORD SWITCH
No power button, no problem. Simply slide the Instant On-Record switch into its locking position to ensure you shoot exactly when you're ready.




VIBRANT COLOR OPTIONS
We understand that style matters and color can make or break a look. Match your kit, or bring in a little contrast by adding a ContourROAM2 in one of three colors: red, blue or traditional black.




60 FRAMES PER SECOND
As requested by our customers, we've bumped up the frames per second to 60 when shooting at 720p, meaning you can now get that smooth video quality you've come to expect from Contour cameras.




WATERPROOF WITHOUT A CASE
Good things come in small packages. The ContourROAM2 sheds bulk by working underwater without an extra case. Minimalism is a good thing.




LOW PROFILE DESIGN
Contour cameras have won numerous awards for their stylish, yet functional, low-profile design. The ContourROAM2 is exceptionally designed and lightweight. With the ContourROAM2, less really is more.




VERSATILITY
Whether snorkeling, snowboarding, or tearing up single track, the ContourROAM2 is ready for any adventure. It's compatible with every Contour mount giving you unlimited angles. The 270° rotating lens means no matter where the camera is mounted, you'll always get the perfect, level shot.




LASER ALIGNMENT
Get the correct angle any time with the built-in laser level.




LONG BATTERY LIFE
Shoot up to 3.5 hours of footage. The Instant On-Record switch means there is no standby mode. The battery is only in use when shooting, giving you more bang per charge.




MICRO SD CARD INCLUDED
We've added a 4GB MicroSD card so your camera is ready to use right out of the box.







VIDEO FORMATS
Video Format Resolution Frame Rate Full HD 1080p 1920 x 1080 30 fps Tall HD 960p 1280 x 960 30 fps Action HD 1280 x 720 60 fps, or 30 fps 5MP Still Photo 2592 X 1944 1, 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30, 45, of 60 sec 




WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 

ContourRoam2 Camera
Micro SD Card (4GB) Profile Mount
Rotating Flat Surface Mount
Quickstart Guide USB 2.0 Cable 






COMPARE CONTOUR CAMERA MODELS
CONTOURROAM2 Dead Simple Action Video CONTOUR+2 The Next Evolution Instant On Record Switch Record Lock Switch Waterproof to one meter Built-in Tripod (1/4" - 20) Mount Flush Front Lens Still Photo Mode Laser Alignment Removable Lithium-ion Battery GPS Bluetooth HDMI USB Connection Internal Mic External Mic Jack microSD Memory Card Included 4GB 4GB Wide Angle Lens 170° 170° Lens Rotation 270° 270° Weight 5.1oz 5.5oz Dimensions (mm) 100 x 55 x 34 98 x 60 x 34 Included Mounts Profile Mount, Rotating Surface Mount Profile Mount, Rotating Surface Mount (2) Included Cables USB USB, Mini HDMI, Mic Cable Included Case Waterproof Case 



CONTOUR RECOMMENDED ACCESSORIES
CONTOUR VENTED HELMET MOUNT 

CONTOUR PROFILE MOUNT 

CONTOUR FLEX STRAP MOUNT 

CONTOUR WINDSHIELD MOUNT 






 ACCESSORIES FOR EVERY SEASON 
 Shop Contour Recommended Accessories by sport: 

 WINTER SPORTS 
 AUTOSPORTS/MOTORCROSS 
 MOUNTAIN BIKING 
 HUNTING/FISHING 
 SURF 
 UNDER WATER 
 PAINTBALL/TACTICAL
feature_bullets: Locking Instant On-Record Switch No power button, no problem. Simply slide the Instant On-Record switch into its locking position to ensure you shoot exactly when you’re ready.

Vibrant color options We understand that style matters and color can make or break a look. Match your kit, or bring in a little contrast by adding a ContourROAM2 in one of four colors: Contour green, red, blue or traditional black.
60fps As requested by our users, we’ve bumped up the frames per second to 60, meaning you can now get that smooth video quality you’ve come to expect from Contour cameras.
Waterproof without a case Good things come in small packages. The ContourROAM2 sheds bulk by working underwater without an extra case.
